sentences.en: Anyone of right mind would have considered it a ghastly joke.
sentences.cn: 任何大脑健全的人也许都会把它看成一种可怕的玩笑.

sentences.en: He was surrounded by people who fed him ghastly lies.
sentences.cn: 他周围的人都在给他灌输可怕的谎言。

sentences.en: His face was ghastly white twitching with suppressed pain.
sentences.cn: 面孔像死鬼一般苍白,忍痛痉挛着.
我觉得那样很讨厌[很糟糕],我对此很反感.

sentences.en: I felt ghastly about refusing, but I had no alternative.
sentences.cn: 我觉得要加以拒绝很不是滋味, 但我别无他途.

sentences.en: It was the worst week of my life. It was ghastly.
sentences.cn: 这是我这辈子最倒霉的一周，别提有多烦了。

sentences.en: It's a ghastly murder I ever heard.
sentences.cn: 那我听过的是可怕的谋杀.

sentences.en: The consequences would be too ghastly to contemplate.
The ghastly sight gave him the shudders.
sentences.cn: 那恐怖的景象使他感到恐惧.

sentences.en: The psychiatrist interpreted John's ghastly dream.
sentences.cn: 精神病学医生解释了约翰那可怕的梦.

sentences.en: They had a ghastly time at the party.
sentences.cn: 聚会时他们玩得极不开心.

sentences.en: We had a ghastly holiday; it rained all the time.
sentences.cn: 我们的假日过得十分不愉快, 整天下雨.

sentences.en: We had a ghastly time at the Chritmas party.
sentences.cn: 在这次圣诞节联欢会上我们玩得很不愉快.

sentences.en: When he heard the news, his face took on a ghastly expression.
sentences.cn: 他听到这个消息, 脸色变得很难看.

sentences.en: You look ghastly; are you all right?
sentences.cn: 你脸色很难看, 是不舒服了 吗 ?

trans.tran_cn: 可怕的，（脸色）苍白的，极坏的
trans.tran_en: making you very frightened, upset, or shocked
